title: rioter read please
body:
I know everyone is complaining about the queue times in ranked but I just wanted to know if something is actually being done about this or if its one of those things that cannot be fixed? 
thanks for your help everyone!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

replies.body:
[Here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/XvqbAgrF-lets-talk-about-dynamic-queues-and-ranked-play)'s what Riot Lyte had to say on this issue:

_"For queue time (queue start to champ select), as measured during non-peak hours, we’re averaging three minute queues across all players, and about eight and a half minutes for Master+ players. **This is also something we’ll be looking to improve over the weekend.**"_

[Riot](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/01/red-post-collection-update-on-dynamic.html#1) has also said:

_"We’re seeing queue times for high-skill and pro players drop dramatically and are working on further improvements."_

Essentially, they're working on it. Keep in mind this is hard to fix because match-making needs to be as high quality as possible, sometimes resulting in long queue times.
thanks a lot man appreciate it
"someone from riot give me attention please" i know the answer but im not a rioter, sorry for not being good enough
ahahahah "rioter give me attention" have a sook buddy
